data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Grand Cay, Bahamas so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Grand Cay, Bahamas

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Grand Cay, Bahamas to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Grand Cay, Bahamas to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Grand Cay, Bahamas that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Grand Cay
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the state of Grand Cay.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Grand Cay.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the state of Grand Cay, Bahamas has a population of 400.

We estimate Grand Cay has 158 people who might know Jesus, 219 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 22 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2 neighbors who need Jesus.
